website.ProjectNameDesc: MERN, NextJS, Bootstrap, Html, Css, Api, JS
ProjectDesc: We created a project named `Linnker` which solves the problem of finding the WhatsApp groups. It is a website which is made in NextJS technology. It consists of the features like login, signup, creating your own groups, search for your best-fit group, searching groups. It has an admin panel which is used verify the validity the WhatsApp group link, admin only allow valid WhatsApp group to show to the users. It solves the major problem of users to find there best-suited WhatsApp group.
We have used Technologies like Nextjs, Mongodb, Nodejs, Expressjs, Reactjs, Html, Css, Bootstrap, Api, Javascript.
This is a MERN website which stores notes of users. User can sign-up to create account and login to access thier notes.
It has the functionality to create, update and delete the notes according to user. Responsive UI design.

It is very useful website to perform some operation on text, strings and characters. It can perform operation like convert to uppercase, convert to lowercase, remove extra space, clear text, copy text. It shows the summary of the entered string also, it tells about number of words and characters in string, how much ideal time it take to read that string. It has a feature of light mode and dark blue mode.
It uses technologies like Reactjs, bootstrap, Html, Css, javaScript.
This website is to collect donation for poor children education. It contains section like about-us, home, contact-us.
It uses the RazorPay integration for collecting donation.
This website uses Axios API to fetch the emojis. It uses react.js component to display emojis.
It contains features like search the emoji on the basis of its name, copy to clipboard, robust code.
This is a website to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) with the help of backend calculation using javascript.
Frontend based on react.js. It shows the BMI table also to the user who want to check accurately.
This is a website which keeps track of student attendance with check-in time and check-out time.
It has robust code which handle when user doesn't provide all the information. It uses react hooks for state management.
It is a Jumbling the word game website. Where user will be given with a jumbled word related to programming world and user need to guess the correct word.
It uses JSON to store few words and randomly displaying to the user to guess.
It is a number guessing game Website. Where the user need to guess the number between 1-50 in some limited life lines.
It contains page navigation, sections, robust code, etc.
Basic React Calculator app which is used to add, subtract, multiply, divide.
It uses HTML, CSS grid, javascript for operations and react.js for frontend view.
This Frontend Website shows the popular movies, TV Series, Drama, Actions, etc
It has search functionality also based on the tag selected.

website.ProjectNameDesc: React.js, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Express.js, MongoDB
ProjectDesc: Platform where people can fill out forms for garbage collecting requests or register from our website to be verified users. We will have a Tie-up with a municipal Corporation garbage collecting vehicle to allow one person from our worker's team to manage the regular attendance of verified users. After a person gives garbage, we will increase his virtual coins. When the virtual coins of a particular user reach a mark (set in our Project), then the person can redeem an Amazon voucher from those coins.
It is a problem solving project uses technologies like HTML, CSS, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB

It contains the logic of the game and announces the winner at the end. Contains all the navigation menus. The UI is responsive but not so good because this project was created in my initial days of the coding journey.
